quiz.question: Which collective noun describes a group of zebras standing together?
Which collective noun names a group of foxes commonly used in literature?
Which collective noun is historically applied to a group of jellyfish in nautical language?
Which collective noun refers to people singing together in structured harmony?
Which collective noun describes people gathered for worship in one place?
Which rare collective noun describes a group of caterpillars moving together?
Which collective noun names a group of lions in English?
Which collective noun names a group of swans on land or water near each other?
Which collective noun names a group of stags assembled during rutting season?
Which collective noun famously describes a group of owls?
Which collective noun names a group of rhinoceroses moving together?
Which collective noun names a group of kangaroos when they are running quickly?
Which collective noun is used when many bees gather or move together?
Which collective noun describes a group of hedgehogs found together?
Which collective noun names a group of apes in some more obscure English lists?
